fullDescription.intro: This layer repeats the layer input for the specified number of times. Corresponds to the Keras Repeat Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The number of times the input should be repeated. For instance the input shape (32) will result in (3, 32) for N = 3.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Repeat layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Repeat layer.
